pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Prelude CLIInteract with the full range of features in Prelude Detect, organized by:- IAM: manage your account - Build: write and maintain your collection of security tests- Detect: schedule security tests for your endpoints## Quick start```bashpip install prelude-cliprelude --helpprelude --interactive```## Documentationhttps://docs.preludesecurity.com/docs/prelude-cli
